thread.title: What the return of football means to an oil boom town
thread.title_full: Video: What the return of football means to an oil boom town | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: What the return of football means to an oil boom town
text: Like so many small towns on the Great Plains, Alexander, North Dakota, had been shrinking as more and more young people moved away. But for the first time in 28 years, Alexander has a football team, thanks largely to an oil field that has drawn workers and families from around the country. Emily Guerin of public media reporting project Inside Energy reports.
